ai-patthana18.21:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in the teachings,)
ai-patthana18.21:0.3_0: And he distinguished the phenomena in the winner.
ai-patthana18.21:1.1_0: Because of perception, not a cause.
ai-patthana18.21:2.1_0: fatiguence gives rise to diversity of principles. Saction doesn’t give rise to a cause.
ai-patthana18.21:3.1_0: There is no way for the sake of flood, not for the sake of seeing.
ai-patthana18.21:4.1_0: Because of this thing, not for the sake of attachment.
ai-patthana18.21:5.1_0: For the sake of hindrances are a cause and a reason for the sake of purification.
ai-patthana18.21:6.1_0: for the sake of hope for the sake of deterioration, not for the sake of cause negligence.
